            "title": [
              [
                "int main(void)\n{\n  int a[2];\n  int * p1 = &a[0], * p2 = &a[1];\n  ptrdiff_t pd = p2 - p1;\n\n  printf(\"p1 = %p\\n\", (void*) p1);\n  printf(\"p2 = %p\\n\", (void*) p2);\n  printf(\"p2 - p1 = %td\\n\", pd);\n\n  return EXIT_SUCCESS;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },

              [" for this example is 4."]
